sentence.Network_en: Ocelot: You were lucky. We'll meet again! ( the same line from MGS 1 )
sentence.Network_cn: Ocelot: 算你走运, 我们还会再见面的! ( 跟MGS1一样的台词 )

sentence.Network_en: Ocelot: That's right. There'll be no accidents this time.
sentence.Network_cn: Ocelot: 没错, 这次不会再有什么意外了.

sentence.Network_en: Ocelot : Looks like your luck hasn't run out yet.
sentence.Network_cn: Ocelot: 看起来你的运气还没有用光.
